apis.description: Returns a paginated list of reports for the current context.

operations.notes: Returns a paginated list of reports for the current context.

response_fields.name: parameters
response_fields.description: The parameters will vary for each report

apis.description:
Generates a report instance for the account. Note that "report" in the
request must match one of the available report names. To fetch a list of
available report names and parameters for each report (including whether or
not those parameters are required), see
{api:AccountReportsController#available_reports List Available Reports}.

operations.notes:
Generates a report instance for the account. Note that "report" in the
request must match one of the available report names. To fetch a list of
available report names and parameters for each report (including whether or
not those parameters are required), see
{api:AccountReportsController#available_reports List Available Reports}.

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.description:
The parameters will vary for each report. To fetch a list
of available parameters for each report, see {api:AccountReportsController#available_reports List Available Reports}.
A few example parameters have been provided below. Note that the example
parameters provided below may not be valid for every report.

parameters.name: parameters[course_id]
parameters.description:
The id of the course to report on.
Note: this parameter has been listed to serve as an example and may not be
valid for every report.

parameters.name: parameters[users]
parameters.description:
If true, user data will be included. If
false, user data will be omitted. Note: this parameter has been listed to
serve as an example and may not be valid for every report.

apis.description: Shows all reports that have been run for the account of a specific type.

operations.notes: Shows all reports that have been run for the account of a specific type.

apis.description: Returns the status of a report.

operations.notes: Returns the status of a report.

id.description: The unique identifier for the report.

file_url.description: The url to the report download.

attachment.description: The attachment api object of the report. Only available after the report has completed.

created_at.description: The date and time the report was created.

started_at.description: The date and time the report started processing.

ended_at.description: The date and time the report finished processing.

current_line.description: This is the current line count being written to the report. It updates every 1000 records.

ReportParameters.description: The parameters returned will vary for each report.

enrollment_term_id.description: The canvas id of the term to get grades from

include_deleted.description: If true, deleted objects will be included. If false, deleted objects will be omitted.

course_id.description: The id of the course to report on

order.description: The sort order for the csv, Options: 'users', 'courses', 'outcomes'.

users.description: If true, user data will be included. If false, user data will be omitted.

accounts.description: If true, account data will be included. If false, account data will be omitted.

terms.description: If true, term data will be included. If false, term data will be omitted.

courses.description: If true, course data will be included. If false, course data will be omitted.

sections.description: If true, section data will be included. If false, section data will be omitted.

enrollments.description: If true, enrollment data will be included. If false, enrollment data will be omitted.

groups.description: If true, group data will be included. If false, group data will be omitted.

xlist.description: If true, data for crosslisted courses will be included. If false, data for crosslisted courses will be omitted.

include_enrollment_state.description: If true, enrollment state will be included. If false, enrollment state will be omitted. Defaults to false.

enrollment_state.description: Include enrollment state. Defaults to 'all' Options: ['active'| 'invited'| 'creation_pending'| 'deleted'| 'rejected'| 'completed'| 'inactive'| 'all']

start_at.description: The beginning date for submissions. Max time range is 2 weeks.

end_at.description: The end date for submissions. Max time range is 2 weeks.
